product_name: O'Neill Skins RG8 Rashguard T-Shirt - Men's
long_description: Featuring high recycled content, the O'Neill Skins RG8 rashguard T-shirt brings soft, quick-drying comfort to your day on the water. O'Neill Skins RG8 rashguard T-shirt provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Recycled polyester and elastane fabric dries quickly and feels soft against skin. Slim-fitting design works with your paddle stroke. Water-based inks create shirt graphics. Small loop at the hem prevents shirt ride up when connected to board short laces (board shorts not included). Hand wash and drip dry.
short_description: Featuring high recycled content, the O'Neill Skins RG8 rashguard T-shirt brings soft, quick-drying comfort to your day on the water.
